name: Reverser (The Scarf)
description:
One day, you realized you have a weird nanotechnology thing attached to your brain. It reverses the timeline. What will you do? Who will you save? Will you die? No one knows, and the only way to find out is to play the game that thing has made for you.

10 reasons why you should play:

1. It's a cool game

2. It's a funny game

3. It's a little bit brutal game (in upcoming updates)

4. The creator is immature sometimes (or mature sometimes)

5. It's not so bad

6.  It's a short game (for now)

7. It's worth it

8. It's a very good game

9. It's a dumb game

10. It has some bad words

That's it

Why I'm so late with publishing it?

Because I'm fucking lazy
